messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Let it rock!
It’s the rhythm of battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Can you hear it?
That’s my guitar weeping...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m too torn up to sing anymore...
I am so cool that way...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Rock ’n’ roll!
We’ll beat it out again! Our rhythm of battle!
